short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play and learn your things in every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabHub help you learn new things by 'play' Image/WebApp/RssFeeds cards. You can custom play order mode(Random/Repeat/Repeat one). And besides our official resources you can make your own resource by following a JSON schema we defined, it's easy and simple. You can find how to in our official website.
long.zh_CN: TabHub help you learn new things by 'play' Image/TabHubApp/RssFeeds cards. You can custom play order mode(Random/Repeat/Repeat one). And besides our official resources you can make your own resource by following a JSON schema we defined, it's easy and simple. You can find how to in our official website.
